flawed_nl_solution:
If Darius scored 10 points, then Marius scored 10 + 3 = <<10+3=13>>13 points in total.
Darius scored 5 points less than Matt, so Matt scored 10 + 5 = <<10+5=13>>13 points in total.
So all three friends gathered 13 + 13 + 10 = <<13+13+10=36>>36 points.
#### 36

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
